entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
